column2:
"...is it really ok? Although it is what I
have asked for, it might be a rather
impossible request this time..."

"However, you have always fulfilled all
my requests, right?!"

"I will also believe in you this time! In
difficult times, thinking about delicious
meat can help you to try your best!"

"……本当にいいの？
頼んでおいて言うのも何だけど
かなり無理なお願いだし……"

"でも、これまでいつも
あなたはやってくれたものね！"

"今回も信じてるわ。
苦しいときは、プリップリの
おいしいお肉を思い出して頑張って！"
